ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: As for him who is given his Book in his right hand,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And he who is given his ledger in his right hand
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Whoever is given the Record in his right hand
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The reckoning of those whose Book of records will be given into their right hands
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So whoever is given his record of deeds in his right hand –
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Then as for him who will be given his Record in his right hand,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Then as to him who is given his book in his right hand,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Then as for him who is given his book in his right hand,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Then whoso is given his account in his right hand
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: he who is given his record in his right hand
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Then as to him who shall be given his book in his right hand -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Then, as for him who is given his record [of deeds] in his right hand,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Then he who is given his Record in his right hand,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Then, as for him who will be given his Record in his right hand,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Then, he who is given his Book in his right hand
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: As for him who is given his book in his right hand.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Then as for he who is given his record in his right hand,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [84:7] Then as for him who is given his book, the record of his deeds, in his right hand — and this is the believer —
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Then whoso is given his account) the account of his good works (in his right hand) in reference here to Abu Salamah Ibn 'Abd al-Asad
